attributes.action: prevent the development of a Tesco superstore on the site of the Aston Martin factory in Newport Pagnell
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Tesco would like to build a 15,000ft superstore on the historic site of the original Aston Martin factory in Newport Pagnell.  This is now a residential area, and we believe the impact of a 24-hour superstore on the residents, not to mention the struggling high street 400m away, would be hugely detrimental.

rejection.details: Please raise your concerns with your local authority.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
